airhockeyjava.graphics

Class ImageFilteringPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • airhockeyjava.graphics.ImageFilteringPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ImageFilteringPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Graphics panel that displays sliders so that an HSV image levels can be mutated, based on the Hue, Saturation and Value.
    Author:
    Nima Akhbari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
